biotools.summary: Toolkit of Perl modules aimed at bioinformatics, genomics, and gerontology, partly based on the BioPerl package, which aim is to allow the comparative genomics of aging. It is a collection of data-mining tools, algorithms, parsers, wrappers, spiders and web applications, etc.

bioschemas.name: ARCT
